attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore is a remarkable man & a war hero who has achieved an outstanding contribution in fund raising for NHS charities as he approaches his 100th Birthday.  All out of the goodness of his heart.
attributes.background: A possible knighthood or similar by The Queen to mark his amazing achievement in fundraising in time for his 100th birthday.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
